text: Natural areas in Tajikistan include: *Pamir National Park *Ramit State Nature Reserve *Tigrovaya Balka Nature Reserve *Zorkul Nature Reserve ==Ramsar Convention (wetland) sites== *Karakul (Tajikistan) (Lake) *Kayrakkum Reservoir *Panj River ==References== ==See also== * :Category:Protected areas of Tajikistan
title: Natural areas in Tajikistan
